name: emp-job-queue
description: EmProps Job Queue System - TypeScript rebuild of emp-redis

scripts.dev:local-redis:stop: echo '🛑 Stopping local Redis server...' && brew services stop redis && echo '✅ Local Redis stopped'
scripts.machines:basic:up: pnpm machines:basic:down && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && cp .env.local.prod .env.local && ./generate-docker-compose.sh && docker compose --env-file .env.local.prod --project-name basic-machine-prod --profile expose-ports up
scripts.machines:basic:up:build: pnpm machines:basic:down && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && cp .env.local.prod .env.local && ./generate-docker-compose.sh && docker compose --env-file .env.local.prod --project-name basic-machine-prod --profile expose-ports up --build
scripts.machines:basic:local:up: pnpm machines:basic:local:down && ./scripts/bundle-worker.sh && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && cp .env.local.dev .env.local && ./generate-docker-compose.sh && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.local.dev --project-name basic-machine-local --profile expose-ports up
scripts.machines:basic:local:up:build: pnpm machines:basic:local:down && ./scripts/bundle-worker.sh && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && cp .env.local.dev .env.local && ./generate-docker-compose.sh && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.local.dev --project-name basic-machine-local --profile expose-ports up --build
scripts.machines:basic:up:no-ports: pnpm machines:basic:down && cd apps/machines/basic_machine && docker compose --env-file .env.local.prod --project-name basic-machine-prod up
scripts.machines:basic:down: cd apps/machines/basic_machine && docker compose --env-file .env.local.prod --project-name basic-machine-prod down
scripts.machines:basic:local:down: cd apps/machines/basic_machine && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml --env-file .env.local.dev --project-name basic-machine-local down
scripts.machines:basic:status: echo '🔍 Basic Machine Status Check (Production - port 9091)' && curl -s http://localhost:9091/health | jq || echo '❌ Health check failed'
scripts.machines:basic:local:status: echo '🔍 Basic Machine Status Check (Local - port 9092)' && curl -s http://localhost:9092/health | jq || echo '❌ Health check failed'
scripts.machines:basic:comfyui: echo '🎨 ComfyUI Status Check (Production - port 3189)' && curl -s http://localhost:3189/ | head -n 5 || echo '❌ ComfyUI not responding'
scripts.machines:basic:local:comfyui: echo '🎨 ComfyUI Status Check (Local - port 3190)' && curl -s http://localhost:3190/ | head -n 5 || echo '❌ ComfyUI not responding'
scripts.machines:basic:ports: echo '🌐 Checking Basic Machine Ports (Production):' && echo '  Health (9091):' && nc -z localhost 9091 && echo '    ✅ Open' || echo '    ❌ Closed' && echo '  ComfyUI (3189):' && nc -z localhost 3189 && echo '    ✅ Open' || echo '    ❌ Closed'
scripts.machines:basic:local:ports: echo '🌐 Checking Basic Machine Ports (Local):' && echo '  Health (9092):' && nc -z localhost 9092 && echo '    ✅ Open' || echo '    ❌ Closed' && echo '  ComfyUI (3190):' && nc -z localhost 3190 && echo '    ✅ Open' || echo '    ❌ Closed'
